text: It is a vibrant and energetic spot perfect for anyone looking to let loose and sing their heart out. Located in the heart of Orchard road, this karaoke venue combines a sleek, modern atmosphere with high quality sound systems and an impressive selection of songs in multiple languages, catering to both local and international guests. The rooms are well decorated, spacious and equipped with comfortable seating, making it a great choice for groups and parties. The staff is friendly and attentive, ensuring that guests have everything they need to enjoy a seamless experience. With reasonable rates and frequent promotions, HaveFun Karaoke is an ideal place to unwind with friends and family for a fun night out. Whether you're a seasoned singer or just there to have fun, it’s a fantastic spot to create memorable moments!. Food was also good. The staff helped us to get disposable boxes for us to pack the extra food.

Quite a bad place to pick from if you're looking for a fun time to sing songs due to its facilities. The app is not user friendly and even the download app on the phone is not updated. They don't have any songs, it's all 1-2years old songs on the phone, you will need to use the in-house tablet to select the latest song which is not user friendly.
On the start, I came in into the room with mic that is not serviceable due to lack of battery and follow up the room door is not serviceable, it will not shut properly....but it could be just the room (E05) is not very good.

Overall, this place is such a let down as compare to Bugis Cube outlet. I will still prefer Bugis Cube outlet.

Overall experience (★☆☆☆☆ 1-5, 5 is the best)
Ambient ★★☆☆☆
Convenience ★★★★☆
Queue/food waiting time ★★★★☆
Price ★★☆☆☆
Service ★★★☆☆
Facilities ★★☆☆☆

Not bad, the had drinks and mixers available the rooms were pretty clean. The food was average abit oily for the prawn rolls, but apart from that it’s fine. The food was mainly just deep fried frozen food. Everything else was alright

Overall, everything was just ok. The people working weren't really interested in anything and rarely paid attention. The atmosphere was ok, the couch had a few stains but the lighting is good. Heard about the baby roaches but luckily I didn't see any. The choice of songs are amazing (mostly on the older side) and easy to pick.

We feel so welcomed with the service provided by Alicia and Bernard! We came on 冬至, and asked Bernard if we can order rice ball. Bernard told us initially that it's not served, but Alicia and Bernard paid a surprise visit to our room with 3 cups of rice balls. It's so heartwarming! Thank you, Alicia and Bernard, for your care and service! Will definitely visit again!
